pullrequest.title: Save models' material and meshes when logging targeting gazebo7

content.raw:
a few issues to resolve:

* saving meshes and materials that use absolute URI paths

* saving models inserted after launching the world

* saving gazebo media resources (e.g. a few models references: `file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material`)
content.html:
a few issues to resolve:

  • saving meshes and materials that use absolute URI paths

  • saving models inserted after launching the world

  • saving gazebo media resources (e.g. a few models references: file://media/materials/scripts/gazebo.material)
